nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.slurm

Class SlurmSchedulerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.scripting.SchedulerConnection
      • nl.esciencecenter.xenon.adaptors.slurm.SlurmSchedulerConnection

  • public class SlurmSchedulerConnection
extends SchedulerConnection
    Interface to the GridEngine command line tools. Will run commands to submit/list/cancel jobs and get the status of queues.
    Since:
    1.0
